value.name: Las Vegas police share update on officer’s fatal shooting of gunman

value.name: Man was shooting randomly at citizens before Las Vegas officer killed him, police say
value.description: Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Assistant Sheriff Brett Zimmerman said William Holt Jr., 49, was in an elevated position at the apartment complex in downtown Las Vegas armed with two rifles.

value.name: Police: Man shot 'indiscriminately' at people, cars before Las Vegas officer shot him
